Major_Arcs.title: The Paul Bunyan Circus Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's unexpected involvement in circus drama, from his introduction as a strongman to confronting sabotage and ultimately choosing peace over circus life.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Paul Bunyan and the Circus Spectacle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan in the circus and then shifts to the audience's wonder at the circus, specifically a giraffe, setting the scene and initial tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Circus and Giraffe Sighting

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Confrontation in the Circus Tent
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the man in checkered shirt's (Paul Bunyan) investigation of a cry for help, leading to a confrontation with Billings and the revelation of Carrumba Matto Grasso.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Billings and 'The Strongest Man'

sub_scenes.title: Resolution of the Circus Conflict and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the immediate threat, introduces the circus owner, and presents Paul Bunyan with a job offer to become the new strongman.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge Plots and Paul Bunyan's Heroism
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Matto Grasso's envy and revenge plans, first with kerosene and fire, then with releasing a gorilla, both thwarted by Paul Bunyan's strength and quick action.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan, the Circus Strongman and Grasso's Envy
Setting the Tent Ablaze and Paul Bunyan's Intervention
The Big Ape is Set Loose
Paul Bunyan Grabs Gigantico and Flees

sub_scenes.title: Capture of Matto Grasso and Paul Bunyan's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the fight with Grasso's accomplice, Grasso's capture, the re-offered job, and Paul Bunyan's final decision to return to the North Woods, rejecting the circus life.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan and Hi-toun Adventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's journey through Tibet and arrival in Hi-toun, where he gets involved in local mysteries and supernatural encounters, ultimately leading to a confrontation with an ogress.

sub_scenes.title: Encounter in Tibet and the Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Marco Polo in Tibet, then shifts to a separate encounter where a man on horseback discovers a talking severed head in need of rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with the Awful Ogress of Tibet
Discovery and Plea of the Severed Head

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Hi-toun and City in Mourning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows the man and the severed head as they form a partnership, travel to Hi-toun, and discover the city is in mourning, not celebration.

narrative_arcs.title: The Gift of the Sacred Dagger and the Journey to Hi-toun
Arrival at Hi-toun and the City's Mourning

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo in Mourning Hi-toun and the Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene merges Marco Polo's narrative into Hi-toun, where he learns about the missing princess and then gets involved with a distressed woman leading him to a suspicious 'witch's castle'.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Arrives in Hi-toun and Learns of Trouble
The Grief over Princess Lotus's Disappearance
A Plea for Help and the Suspicious Castle

sub_scenes.title: Entrapment and Confrontation in the Ogress's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco's entry into the castle, the bizarre reveal of 'poor children' as rats, his confinement, the ogress's reveal, and the beginning of the fight with monstrous rats.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Summoning 'Poor Children'
The 'Poor Children' Revealed as Rats and Marco's Disgust
Confinement and the Pretense of Hospitality
Realization of Treachery and Ogress Revelation
Summoning the Monstrous Mice and Preparing for Battle
Sword Against Claws: The Fight Begins

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Escape from the Ogre's Lair
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a different captive situation involving a cloaked figure and a man, then back to Marco and the Ogress where Marco escapes with a magic knife, rescuing a woman in the process.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife
Unusual Mourning Decorations and Safe Return Request

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure Keeper's Tale of Greed and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a cautionary tale narrated by the Treasure Keeper, focusing on greed, betrayal, and violence surrounding a hidden treasure, leading to death and police investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Penal Colony Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with the Treasure Keeper introducing the tale and then shifts to a British penal colony where a captain arrives, setting the scene for a story of intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Penal Colony and Captain's Inquiry

sub_scenes.title: The Treasure Deal and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the prisoner's offer of treasure to the Captain, their agreement for escape, and the Captain's subsequent betrayal, leaving the prisoner in despair.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in England and Renewed Vow

sub_scenes.title: The Revenge Plot and Deadly Treasure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Jordan's plan for revenge, his confrontation with the Captain, their midnight meeting, and the deadly fight for the treasure in the attic.

sub_scenes.title: Police Investigation and Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the police investigation of the attic murder, the escape attempt, and the narrator concluding the tale with a moral lesson about greed.

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of the haunted Matthews estate, Vincent Matthews's vengeful ghost, and the investigation by Henry Northrup to resolve the supernatural disturbances.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Vincent Matthews and the Estate Problem
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a seemingly unrelated conflict, then shifts to a courtroom sentencing of Vincent Matthews, a murderer, setting up the backstory for the haunted estate.

sub_scenes.title: The Realtor's Plea and Northrup's Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx, the realtor with problems at the Matthews estate, and Henry Northrup, the supernatural investigator called in to solve the haunting.

narrative_arcs.title: The Realtor's Problem with Matthews Estate
Concerns about Disposing of the Matthews Estate
Rumors of Vincent Matthews' Ghost and Tenant Troubles
Warning of Evil and Strange Occurrences at the Old House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Resolution with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Northrup's solo entry into the haunted house, his confrontation with Vincent Matthews's ghost, their physical struggle, and ultimately, a resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Assault and Claim of Superiority
Confession and the Path to Salvation
Revelation of Murder and the Need for Forgiveness
The Plea for Brotherly Love and Redemption
Entering the House and Explaining Unexplained Events

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages and Mutiny of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical voyages of Henry Hudson, his search for the Northwest Passage, the growing discontent of his crew, and the tragic mutiny that led to his demise.

sub_scenes.title: The Proposition and Eagerness for a New Voyage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the historical context of Henry Hudson's ill-fated journey and then depicts the Dutch East India Company offering him a new voyage to find the Northwest Passage, which Hudson eagerly accepts.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unsolved Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition to Captain Hudson

sub_scenes.title: Exploration, Disappointment, and Return Voyage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows the initial voyage, the crew's growing discontent, the exploration of the Hudson River which proves to be a false lead, and the decision to return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Crew's Discontent and Exploration of Hudson River
Hudson's Failure and Return to Holland

sub_scenes.title: The Ill-fated Northerly Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hudson's second voyage, the extreme northerly route leading to being icebound, the crew's despair and questioning of Hudson's sanity, and finally, the outbreak of mutiny after the ice melts.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage Backed and Hudson's Hope
Extreme Northerly Route and Crew's Despair

sub_scenes.title: Mutiny, Banishment, and Mutineers' Fate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the mutiny itself, Hudson and his loyal men being banished, Hudson's vow of revenge, and the mutineers' return home to face arrest and justice.

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan the Arabian Knight vs. the Tartars
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the heroic tale of Hassan, the Arabian Knight, who confronts the Tartar invaders and their leader Kurgan to rescue a kidnapped woman, culminating in a decisive duel and romantic resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Hassan and the Tartar Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan and the threat of the Tartar invasion, setting up the conflict and Hassan's destined role in confronting them.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Arabian Knight and the Tartar Threat
Summoning and Mission Briefing by the Caliph
The Rescue Mission: Kidnapped Daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali

sub_scenes.title: Hassan's Journey and Infiltration of the Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Hassan's journey to the Tartar camp, his encounter with a warning traveler, reaching the camp outskirts, subduing a sentry, and infiltrating the camp in disguise.

narrative_arcs.title: Hassan Sets Out to Confront the Tartars
Journey to the Oasis of El Sholem
Discovery of Tartar Trail at the Oasis
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Offering of Water and Continued Warning
Reaching the Outskirts and Preparing to Strike
Inside the Camp - Seeking the Daughter

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Attempt and Duel with Kurgan's Warriors
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's contact with the captive, the detection by guards, the ensuing fight with multiple Tartar warriors, his capture, and the challenge proposed by Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: The Duel and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in the unfair duel where Hassan, unarmed, fights Kurgan's men, achieves victory, claims his reward, and experiences a romantic moment with the rescued woman before departing.

narrative_arcs.title: The Signal and the Unfair Fight Begins
Victory Assured and Demands to Kurgan
